headline: Lina Khan points to Figma IPO as vindication of M&A scrutiny
summary: A surprising figure is celebrating Figma’s successful IPO: Lina Khan, former chair of the Federal Trade Commission, who said the offering demonstrates the value of "letting startups grow into independently successful businesses."

raw.headline: Lina Khan points to Figma IPO as vindication of M&A scrutiny
